trans-unit.source:
\n

Describes the context in which a validation check is performed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object instance to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
It cannot be null.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object instance to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
It cannot be null

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An optional set of key/value pairs to make available to consumers.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This parameter is required.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A dictionary of key/value pairs to make available to the service consumers.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This parameter is optional.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the name of the member to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the member to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the dictionary of key/value pairs that is associated with this context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The dictionary of the key/value pairs for this context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the name of the member to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the member to validate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the object to validate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object to validate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the type of the object to validate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the object to validate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the service that provides custom validation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the service to use for validation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An instance of the service, or null if the service is not available.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The service provider.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
